title: Quick Calabrese-style cod fillets
ingredients: ['2 to 3 tablespoons olive oil', '1 small onion, sliced', '4 cod fillets', '1 pinch of crushed red chilli flakes', '180g cherry tomatoes, cut in half', '2 to 3 sprigs of fresh thyme, roughly chopped', '2 to 3 tablespoons freshly squeezed orange juice']
